author: nguyenthiha07tp1
title: Service Marketplace
description: Lacking a place to gather skilled people able to supply support services for unskilled proposers and CAs with a reasonable cost.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal aims to build an exchange between service providers and customers using services related to Catalyst. This exchange provides a number of typical services such as: guidance on writing standard proposals, CA skills training, translation, logistics services for sponsored projects. This proposal will connect experts and novices to learn about catalysts; they will accompany and contribute to the development with the catalyst fund of the Cardano ecosystem. The proposal will also contribute to promoting more dApp developers to the catalyst fund, aiming to have more and more quality projects develop on the Cardano blockchain.
f6_assessments.q1: To build a very simple online trading platform, this proposal uses Dokan Pro, a marketplace plugin of the WordPress website builder platform, when using this plugin, the proposal will be completed in a short time. Team members have CA experience, they are sharing a lot of new CA education knowledge in their community. The team's ability to write standard proposals is also demonstrated through the Catalyst-funded vcoincheck.io project at fund7. With the above experiences with Catalyst, this proposal will initially have services from the team members themselves, thereby attracting many other content providers.
f6_assessments.q2: After this proposal is completed, users will be able to verify the quality of the service by using the service provided on the website. The proponent also has a clear development roadmap, and the budget is properly allocated for each specific task. It would be better, if the revenue from the service package has a detailed estimate after the project goes into operation, does the proponent plan to use a part of this revenue for the development of the Cardano ecosystem or are not. However, I still appreciate the transparency of this project.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal is based on building a community for projects on Cardano’s platform. This is a necessity. I appreciate this idea.
For the account, I think it's better to use 1 account, which has 2 functions: provider account and customer account, instead of 2 types of accounts. This minimizes account junk and brings convenience to users.
For Service pricing, the prices of services are relatively cheap, which can be good to support the community, but will not bring revenue to the project, which will affect the project's lack of profit. Profit don’t enough to run long term. And doesn't attract many CAs. To solve this, it is possible to create ready-made templates for project construction (these templates have a low service cost), and direct CA consultation (more expensive), especially CA will have many levels of service. and consulting prices for each level. The level represents the quality of CA and will be judged by the community
f6_assessments.q1: This is a potential project. However, team need to consider to fund which is low to run long term
f6_assessments.q2:
Get clarity, the team has people who are experienced in community building, good at English and Japanese, in line with the project's goals
Clear KPI for customer growth, however, additional CA attraction KPIs are needed to evaluate. Customers and CAs need to grow equally, otherwise there will be unnecessary shortages or redundancies
The project needs to assess more challenges and risks in the implementation process

f6_assessments.q0:
- The project addresses the needs of the market. There are people who have ideas but do not have the skills to turn them into reality, there are people who have only single skills that cannot complete a complete project. This project will help connect these pieces of the puzzle together to make a good idea a reality.
- Help Catalyst have more quality proposals, more CAs with better assessment skills
- The project has a multi-language translation to help more people know and deliver Catalyst
- The project states the specific services to be provided to the market
***Projects that need improvement:
- The proposal does not have criteria for evaluating and selecting service providers on the marketplace.
- The proposal provides too many services in different fields: Catalyst, Marketing, financial consulting, community building, interpretation...with unspecified target market
- The proposal does not have a penalty mechanism for poor quality services
- The proposal does not have a process to protect service users if there is a conflict between the two parties
***Suggestions/ advices:
- There should be specific evaluation criteria for service providers on marketpalce to ensure the quality that the project provides. Avoid fraudulent, poor quality services that affect the user experience for Catalyst
For example, how many years of experience does the person giving the CA training skill need, the minimum number of CAs that have been trained. Among those CAs, there should be a minimum of how many CAs receive how many bonuses in 1 Catalyst fund.
- The project should clearly state the target market of the project. For example: the US, Japan, Vietnam... that will help the project focus its resources to avoid rambling, causing waste and not achieving high efficiency.
f6_assessments.q1:
- The project has an action plan for the first 3 months to set up, operate and test
- The work for each month has been planned, but it is still quite general and not specific

- The plan to allocate capital for each item is clear in terms of budget and time
- The team has many members with many years of experience in different fields that will support each other to successfully complete the project's goals.
- The team already has a community in Vietnam
***Projects that need improvement:
- The project has an idea to provide to many markets in many different languages, but it has not been stated in which language the videos, documents and marketing will be made.
- The time for each item is not uniform and reasonable. Running expense is calculated for 1 year but hosting is for 3 years.
- The admin fee is low, which will affect the quality of human resources
- The project to locate the target market is quite large, so the cost of $1,000 for marketing is too little to be effective.
***Suggestions/ advices:
- The project is currently available in the community in Vietnam, so the first steps if the project focuses on the Vietnamese market for testing, modification and upgrade will be much more advantageous. After operating well in Vietnam, the project can expand to Japanese and Korean markets...
- The cost allocated to each item should be calculated in a uniform time frame. The project reduces hosting costs and increases the budget for admin and marketing items, the efficiency of the project will be much higher. Because the Admin is the representative of the project to contact and advise directly to the community, if the admin has an inappropriate attitude or qualifications, it will adversely affect the reputation of the project. In the first time, Marketing is the key point that determines the success of the project.
- The project should have a budget for the selection and evaluation of service providers
f6_assessments.q2:
- The project gives a very clear and specific number of commitments each month
***Projects that need improvement:
The project does not have a website yet
***Suggestions/ advices:
- If the project can buy the domain in advance to keep the name as well as show it on the catalyst for the community to know, it will also be a way of marketing.
- The project shows how to check the indicators that users can track, which will increase the reputation of the project
f6_assessments.reply:
Thank you very much for the comments of CA. We are very pleased that CA is interested in our proposal and gives us valuable comments.
We have some responses to the CA's comments as follows.

About the comments regarding the Impact section

Regarding the criteria for evaluating service providers on Marketplace, we are developing a detailed regulatory document. We will verify the identity, KYC of the service provider when the provider registers. Service providers will need to have proof of their experience and skills when registering.
And to ensure the quality of supplier service is always good, Marketplace will have a supplier review feature. Users (customers who register to use the service) will evaluate the service quality of the provider by scoring the reputation, the service quality satisfaction score. Vendors with high customer satisfaction scores will be prioritized to be displayed on the Marketplace homepage. Suppliers with low customer satisfaction and reputation scores will be restricted from displaying or fined corresponding to the level of customer complaints.
Regarding the target market of the project, in the initial stage, the target market in Vietnam. Once Marketplace is up and running, we plan to expand the service to other countries like Japan, India, and more. The reason for choosing the first target market is Vietnam because the number of Proposals from Vietnam as well as CA is increasing, the demand for support is quite high. And since we are a Vietnamese team, the first phase of deployment in Vietnam will be convenient to support and receive input from the Vietnamese community, thereby quickly completing the Marketplace better.

About the comments regarding the Feasibility section

Because in the first 3 months we will build a foundation and develop in the Vietnamese market, so the Marketing materials and introductory videos will be made in the Vietnamese language. Later, when we expand to other countries, we will translate documents into multi-language
Regarding the time for each item in the budget, the reason we recommend Hosting costs for 3 years is that when we buy a 3-year Hosting package, we will get a 70% discount. Hosting costs for 1 year and 3 years are almost the same. So we proposed a hosting cost of 3 years.
Regarding Admin costs, we save costs by using our team's resources. We will need to hire 1-2 people to assist with vendor consulting when they initially sign up. Admin costs funded by Catalyst will be used to pay the admin staff's salary for 3 months. After that, we will use a part of the service fee collected from the supplier as an administrative cost.
Regarding marketing costs, the reason we only want to get funding is 1,000USD because We have the Cardano Vietnam community, so we can introduce Service Marketplace there, thereby saving advertising costs. Marketing expenses here will be used to create more interactive programs on Marketplace such as Minigame with small gifts. We calculate and choose cost-effective, highly effective marketing methods.
The project's budget may not seem like much, but we want to use the funding from Catalyst most efficiently and optimally. We will try to operate Marketplace to make a profit, thereby turning the capital well.

About the opinion regarding the Transparency section

We are building a website and will soon announce it to the community. We plan to publish the website once the project is funded. The website's domain name is chokynang.com.
Many thanks to the CA for the advice on adding a domain name to the proposal to indirectly market the project.
On how to test project progress metrics, we will periodically report in Catalyst meetings and update the information on our website. The community and Catalyst will check the project development progress through the website chokynang.com.
Here are our responses. Looking forward to the understanding of CA and vCA, Community and Catalyst.
Sincere thanks very much.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal can help to solve the difficult problems of the project when there is a shortage of skilled and qualified personnel. Or individuals with skills and qualifications but with a lot of spare time.
This is an interesting and necessary proposal to help speed up the development of projects on Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1:
They are a team with a lot of members and experience in blockchain, marketing, engineering. This will help them build a basic human resource that can be immediately supplied to projects - customers who are short of staff.
The proposal has not yet measured risks and solutions. That is a minus. Some possible risks:
1. Buyers and sellers collude after knowing each other and do not use the exchange for transactions.
2. Exchange hacked and stole personal information of buyers and sellers.
Haven't seen the proposal mentioning the payment method and how to use the payment method such as card payment or digital currency.
Advantages: Detailed implementation plan and complete work items. This will help the project have a high probability of success when it is implemented.
f6_assessments.q2:
Information about the features as well as solutions is quite detailed and complete.
The indicator measures and evaluates full performance.
Full time and route
Reasonable implementation budget.
Fully qualified team to execute the proposal successfully if funded.
Weaknesses, the team has no experience in building a job exchange, so it cannot control the risks that will arise during the implementation process. That will also be a limitation that reduces the success of the project.

f6_assessments.q0: There is a fact that many have the innovative idea but lack of technical skill to implement while many other have technical expertise but lack of language proficiency or business writing skills to make a good proposal in Catalyst. This proposal is fit to address this issue and if implemented successfully can help to increase the number of good Catalyst proposals submitted for funding.
f6_assessments.q1: Service plans mentioned in the proposal looks good which cover all aspects and phases of Catalyst project. The risk about the ensuring quality of works delivered by service provider is also mentioned and the suggested workaround using reputation score looks good. Payment method which is an essential element is not found in the proposal. I recommend project owner to add payment method information to the proposal. Assuming ADA is used to pay for the service fee, I would suggest the team to think about using Cardano escrow smart contract so that money is only transferred to service provider once the work conditions are met. The core team experience looks qualified for this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: Project timeline has 4 phases with concrete target and output. The first 3 phases last for 3 months and are important period in this project to complete the core tasks to fullfil the requirement and achieve project goal. The suggested KPI is matched with project goal and can be quantitatively verified. The cost breakdown is not elaborated and should be  associated with each phase.

f6_assessments.q0: Proposal is an idea that builds a connection between a service provider and Proposer, CA by building a website where both parties can go and negotiate services and prices. A new idea in the Catalyst space. As the number of proposals is increasing day by day, presenting a proposal is difficult for those entering this space for the first time. Therefore, experienced from senior are needed to support successful funding proposals. Therefore, a place like Marketplace is essential.
f6_assessments.q1:
With a work schedule made within 3 months to launch almost all of the Website features according to the idea, I think such a roadmap is reasonable. The headings also detail what needs to be done.

Regarding budget breakdown, the proposer also listed very clearly each cost for each stage, how much the unit price is. I have a suggestion that it is recommended to take into account unforeseen circumstances such as ADA price fluctuations or a spike in the number of visitors leading to system slowdowns, an additional reserve is needed for this.

The members of the project all have professional experience, meeting the requirements to implement the idea.
f6_assessments.q2:
I agree that the information about each member is fully listed here by the proposer. Attach the individual profile pages of each member so that the voter can check and track.
KPI milestones to measure success are clear, demonstrating the proposer's commitment to the project.
And I believe that with a complete list like this, the proposal will be successfully funded

f6_assessments.q0: I really love this proposal. As a CA, I felt like I had no idea on how to do the work effectively at the beginning. This would benefit the proposers and Community Advisors because they will be able to learn the importance of their role in the funding process. This will also help the proposers to create more effective proposals so that the CA's can navigate through them and pick those of the highest quality. They address the challenge by providing a service marketplace that will help people to understand how to fulfil their roles as proposers and CA's.
f6_assessments.q1: Did a great job with providing the team members and their professional experience. The explanation given of the team is well thought out and they aren't asking for so much. I like to see people get a lot done with such a small fund. This shows the nature of their character and leads to an increase in community involvement and in this case, a more effective funding process.
f6_assessments.q2: The information provided was done in great detail. It was an easy read, with lots of necessary information. Not too long, and not too short. I like the explanation of where the funding will go. Thorough description of how the funds will help the team be successful in carrying out their proposal and project in the future.

f6_assessments.q0: The project addresses a very pressing issue in the community: people without skills are not supported or supported at very high costs. The solution proposed by the project is a precious method to help newcomers to the community shorten the time and save the cost to enter the market. The resolution of the project includes a wide range of services and can help newcomers solve all problems when joining the community. Therefore, I believe the project solution deserves five stars because it is efficient and helpful in solving the mentioned problem.
f6_assessments.q1: The project's experience is very diverse, but the project has not shown information about how deeply they have experience, how many years in that field. However, I appreciate the team of the project and their expertise in various areas. The plan that the project gives is very detailed, with monthly timelines. I believe the project can keep up with this set schedule because the workload is so evenly distributed and manageable. Generally, the project's success is enormously based on the specific plan that the project provides as well as the experience of the team.
f6_assessments.q2: The project's metrics to track the project's progress are also very detailed. From there, we can see that the transparency of the project is very high. The project has also mentioned KPIs with specific timelines and specific metrics. These numbers will most accurately reflect the progress of the project. At the same time, these data will also help the project improve transparency.

f6_assessments.q0: Proposers ,CA's  always need services in one or the other way hence the proposed idea helps the proposers/CA's get skill full workers within less cost. where they even get educated on improving their skills which might be linguistic difficulty or  Block chain difficulty it also helps in introducing the project to the required Community.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team has good experienced people in all the department i.e. Marketing team , Technical team and Administration team . But the Administration team still need couple of highly experienced people which helps them to achieve more goals in the future. 
The proposer has clearly mentioned about services that will be provided for CA's /Proposers which shows proposer has clear vision towards the goal. hence presented  proposal will be implemented successfully with available team.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposer has provided clear picture of all the members of different team , the proposer has even presented budget estimation in most economical fashion available .
The proposer has not stopped just with above services, he has even mentioned about cardano block chain service that can be provided which helps in increased users of cardano in the future hence the information provided is sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
In this proposal, the team of proposers want to create a service Marketplace to connect people with good skills, provide support services for proposers, CAs with a reasonable cost. Service Marketplace is a place to bring together all Catalyst related services where each participant will be entitled to register for 2 types of accounts- service provider account and customer account). Marketplace -  to operate the platform and market to customer needs. The purpose is to provide proposer support services, CAs can perform their tasks more conveniently at a more favorable cost. 
This project in my opinion will help proposers to get the right coaching for excellent proposals, whilst CAs will sell their services to make a living, thereby improving lives now and in the future. 
To address the challenge, this proposal helps to connect skilled people with proposals, CAs who lack skills and experiences which helps to increase the quality of proposals and the quality of CA's assessments. New members who want to become proposer or CA will also join boldly by using support services from proposer, CA experts with good skills on marketplace. 
The main crisk is that it may be difficult to manage the quality of the services that the provider provides in the beginning. But their solution is to apply reputation scoring, service quality score for customers. 
The information given is very relevant and detailed to address the challenge effectively. My rating is 5.
f6_assessments.q1:
The project is a 3 months project which has been demarcated clearly and easy to understand. The plan has been divided into months with specific duties or roles to be carried out 1st, 2nd, 3rd,  is all detailed comprehensively. 
For instance, the 1st month is the building of the Marketplace website, 2nd month is for creation of marketplace video, 3rd month is for testing the marketplace and officially operating marketplace.
The budget is well broken down into costs of domain, hosting, Web Templet, Dokan Pro, etc. The total amount requested is USD 7400 is quite reasonable. 
The team comprises 8 people with the expertise to implement the project successfully. They are experts in business management, Administrators, marketing specialist, etc. All the details provided make the proposal likely to be implemented successfully. My rating is 5 for their great effort.
f6_assessments.q2:
Periodically report with actual transaction dates on the website and marketplace channels where everyone can check progress and results according to the KPIs:
1st Month- complete market place website including multi-vendor feature and interface.
2nd Month- complete 3 videos, implement 4 advert programs,
3rd month- 50 customers ordering services. From the 4th month, community suppliers and customers increased by 150% compared to the previous month, etc.
Success of the project can be seen from these metrics: Attracting more proposers, CAs; expanded community of proposers, CA and catalyst interested people; Supporting projects after being funded in catalyst; Create an additional source of income for skilled people. This is a new proposal. All the details are relevant and sufficient for successful auditing. My rating is therefore 5.

solution: We propose the creation of a Service Marketplace to connect people with good skills, provide support services for proposers, CAs.
experience:
Our team has experience in corporate governance, website administration, and blockchain knowledge, specializing in technology, programming, extensive experience in marketing, create and operate Marketplace.
Other skills, if necessary, we will call for support from the community.
